data.title: Video killed the radio star - but not the good stations!
data.meta_description: Looking for recommendations and links for independent and/or college radio stations which stream
data.text:
August 4, 2024 12:33 PM Subscribe

Looking for recommendations and links for independent and/or college radio stations which stream

I love my local, student-run college radio station WVFS Tallahassee. It plays a lot of diverse kinds of music, has several "specialty" shows that are good, and plays a lot of new stuff I've never heard before . While run by students, they either come in with, or learn, an appreciation for all sorts of music - you can hear Black Flag, Dave Brubeck, and Lefty Frizzell all in the same day, sometimes the same hour.

So - on to the reason for my question: please recommend to me, and if possible, provide a streaming link to, _your_ favorite independent and/or college streaming radio station(s). I would prefer, for college stations, that it be student-run with a faculty advisor, rather than run with university employees, but that's a "nice to have" not a "have to have" requirement.

About Ask MetaFilter

Ask MetaFilter is a question and answer site that covers nearly any question on earth, where members help each other solve problems. Ask MetaFilter is where thousands of life's little questions are answered.
